channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Coronas and Callias type operators in coarse geometry
item.description: arXiv:2411.01646v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We interpret the coarse symbol and index class of a Callias type Dirac operator $D+\Psi$ on a manifold $M$ as a pairing between the coarse symbol and index classes associated to $D$ and K-theory classes of the coarse corona of $M$ or $M$ itself determined by $\Psi$. Local positivity of $D$ and local invertibility of $\Psi$ are incorporated in terms of support conditions on the $K$-theoretic level.
item.dc:creator: Ulrich Bunke, Matthias Ludewig

item.title: Computing the negative $K$-theory of finite groups of order $\leq 100$
item.description: arXiv:2410.14446v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We outline how the group $K_{-1}( \mathbb{Z}[G] )$ for a finite group $G$ can be computed using the computer language $GAP$ and compile a table of all groups $G$ of order less than $100$ that have torsion in $K_{-1}( \mathbb{Z}[G] )$.
item.dc:creator: Georg Lehner
